snippet: New York, New Jersey and Connecticut will have a better chance at persuading Congress for financing if they join forces and ask for an areawide relief package.
abstract: Editorial urges New York Gov Andrew Cuomo, New Jersey Gov Chris Christie and Connecticut Gov Dannel Malloy to make detailed inventory of their disaster relief needs and present them as areawide package in order to best make case for funding from federal government; cautions against requesting funding for far-reaching changes to state infrastructure and to focus on immediate needs of residents.
lead_paragraph: New York, New Jersey and Connecticut will have a better chance at persuading Congress for financing if they join forces and ask for an areawide relief package.
